declaration.statement: The Federal Reserve expects to make three rate cuts in 2024.
declaration.statement_context: Federal Reserve December 2023 Summary of Economic Projections (dot plot), FOMC meeting December 12-13, 2023.
declaration.source_excerpt: The median projection for the federal funds rate is 4.6 percent at the end of 2024, down from 5.1 percent.

expected_outcome.description: Federal Reserve makes three rate cuts during 2024
metrics: Number of FOMC rate cut decisions

operationalization.operationalization_notes: Interpreting 'three rate cuts' as three FOMC decisions to lower the federal funds target rate. Size of cuts is secondary to count.

evidence.summary: The Federal Reserve cut rates exactly 3 times in 2024: September 18, November 7, and December 18. The projection of three cuts was accurate.
evidence.relevance_explanation: Official FOMC decisions. Three cuts occurred as projected.

resolution.resolution_summary: The Fed made exactly 3 rate cuts in 2024 as projected. September: -50bp, November: -25bp, December: -25bp.
resolution.resolution_details: The December 2023 dot plot correctly predicted 3 rate cuts. Timing was delayed (first cut in September vs. early 2024 market expectations), but the count was accurate.
